00044             return TypeID2<Tret>();

00051         {

00061         any Call(MetaInfo &info, any args)
00062         {
00063             const Tparam &cargs=any_cast<Tparam>(args);
00064             cout << "Meta function call to: " << info.Context.Class.GetName() << "::" << info.Context.MethodName << endl;
00065             if (_static) cout << "Method is STATIC." << endl;
00066             cout << "Argument types:" << endl;
00067             OutTupleTypes(Tparam());
00068             cout << "Arguments:" << (Tparam)cargs << endl;
00069             cout << "Return type:" << TypeID<Tret>().Name() << endl;
00070             return Tret();
00071         }

00079         {
00080             return Call(info, many_to_tuple<Tparam>(args));
